page.title: 13THE WILMSLOW EXPRESS
page.content: An important part of any local community is its{local newspaper.}It dispenses news of purely local interest from important events to everyday stories.It highlights local issues, provides information about forthcoming events, airs local views, covers local sport, drama and other activities as well as providing advertising facilities for goods and services. The{Wilmslow Express {Advertiser}is the paper which is run to cater for the needs of the town of{Wilmslow.}It is a{free {newspaper}and first began as a{family {owned business in 1874,}run by{Swain and{Bearby.}At this time the printing plates were set by hand. In{1978}the paper was taken over by the{Manchester {Guardian}and{Evening News}and merged with the{Express Group}in{1981}to become the Wilmslow Express Avertiser.
